p: Extracts were also prepared by using ultrasound-assisted extraction. This method was used as a simple and effective method for nutmeg extracts. The 1 g material and 20 mL solvent were used. We used different concentrations of ethanol for extraction (96%, 70%, and 50%). The flask with substance was put in an ultrasound bath (Sonorex Digitec DT 156 BH, Germany). Extracts were prepared on 25 °C temperature for 30 min. After that, the extracts were filtered with paper filter and stored in a refrigerator at 4 °C until further analysis.
